Donate, share, spread the word please 🙏 camiinthisthang.eth: @womenbuildweb3's accelerator is live on @gitcoin grants 🎉 Gitcoin's quadratic funding matches funds such that even a small donation goes a long way. We're building an engine for innovation & funding women/nb-led engineering projects. Fund here 👇 https://gitcoin.co/grants/6100/women-build-web3-developer-accelerator
